property.name: powershellInstalled
property.description: Enable to indicate Powershell (V3+) installed on the host associated to the Runner

property.name: url
property.description: The URL to test

property.name: expectedResponseText
property.description: Text that is expected to be contained in the HTTP response body, if the response code is in the 200 range. A non-2xx response code will cause the test to fail irrespective of the response body

property.name: unexpectedResponseText
property.description: Text that should not be contained in the HTTP response body, if the response code is in the 200 range. A non-2xx response code will cause the test to fail irrespective of the response body

property.name: showPageInConsole
property.description: Show the page retrieved from the url

property.name: ignoreCertificateWarnings
property.description: If set, certificate warnings when making a connection will be ignored

property.name: startDelay
property.description: Time in seconds to wait before starting the execution of step

property.name: maxRetries
property.description: Number of times to attempt executing the step, in case it fails

property.name: retryWaitInterval
property.description: Time in seconds to wait before next retry

property.name: timeout
property.description: Timeout in seconds for a query on the specified url

property.name: order
property.description: The order of the test step in the step list
